name: SEX VR Horny Nurses
description:
Finally, you are in the resort called JOY, the queue was long but you are lucky and you have an unlimited number of treatments !!!

In the hospital you can visit many rooms where you will have treatments performed by super sexy nurses who will cure all your ailments.
On the list of treatments to choose from, you will find, among others:

- Healing Blowjob

- Doggy style sex to make you smile
- Group sex for shy patients
- Playing with the nurse's breasts to improve agility
- Squeezing the last drop of sperm from the patient !!!
- and many, many other condition-improving treatments

You are free to move around the hospital and visit whatever treatment you want,
if you want to see a nurse perform a treatment for another patient you can ask for it and watch it.

Features:
- Sexy Naked Nurse
- Security Lady SEX
- Sex with the head of the resort
- Sex with Nurses
- Group SEX
- Various sexual positions
- Cumshots
